annonstext:
Software by Quokka AB is a subsidiary of Quokka AB, and part of FIRSTNAME LASTNAME Group. Our company offers high-end software engineering services to enterprises within Automotive, Telecom, MedTech and Fintech. Moreover we are an incubator for start-ups. Within the group of 22 companies we have vast experience from starting new companies and a genuine interest to invest in ideas and people we believe in. We know that our success is based on enabling the full potential of our employees – our most important asset! Our culture is based on trust, care, and joy. On top of this we create an environment permeated of curiosity, creativity, and innovation. 

We are inspired by the Quokka – known for its curiosity and for being the happiest animal on the planet!

Welcome to visit our webpage www.quokka.se or follow us on Instagram @softwarebyquokka!

The vast opportunities with 5G and IoT, increases the vulnerability of our society. In this new reality, engineers with high competence in end to end security will play a key role. Software by Quokka aim to strengthen our competence in the Cyber Security domain and is therefore looking for software engineers with high proficiency in Cyber Security. #jobbjustnu.

Who are you?

We believe that you are curious, flexible, open-minded and eager to continuously improve your skills. You have an innovative, pragmatic, collaborative and creative mind-set of handling technical challenges. You enjoy team-work but at the same time you are able to work independently and drive development on your own. You have a positive attitude and the willingness and ability to take initiatives to progress and deliver.

Education

MSc/BSc Computer Science or equivalent

Required Qualifications

	3+ years of experience from end to end Cyber Security
	Embedded C++ development
	Cryptography, Data protection, Access control
	Experience from penetration testing, risk analysis and training

Meritorious

	Experience in Python, Rust and Go
	Knowledge in cloud technologies and tools, container/microservices and data
	Experience from working with Continuous Integration & Continuous Deployment and related tools like Git, Gerrit, Jenkins, Artifactory
	Experience from connectivity technologies like 3GPP, Bluetooth LE and WiFi

Languages

	English, proficient level

utbildningsniva.namn: Eftergymnasial utbildning två år eller längre
